General.Name: Zhangjiagang Zhonghuan Hailu High-End Equipment Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Zhangjiagang Zhonghuan Hailu High-End Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of industrial metal forgings in China. The company offers bearing, flange, ring gear, and other industrial metal forgings. It serves various industries, including wind power, construction and mining machinery, nuclear power, ships, electric power, petrochemical, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.
